definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Guang3 bo1 Dian4 tai2

definition: Radio Television Hong Kong (RTHK), public broadcaster

pinyin: Zhong1 yang1 guang3 bo1 dian4 tai2
Ying1 guo2 Guang3 bo1 Dian4 tai2

definition: Australian Broadcasting Corporation (ABC), Australian state-run broadcaster
pinyin: Ao4 zhou1 Guang3 bo1 Dian4 tai2
Zi4 you2 Ya4 zhou1 Dian4 tai2

sentences.english: Can you pick up London on the radio?
sentences.chinese: 你的收音机能收听到伦敦的电台吗？

sentences.english: Some stations broadcast 24 hours of the day.
sentences.chinese: 有些电台一天24小时广播。

sentences.english: If you live near Quebec, you will probably be able to pick up some French stations.
sentences.chinese: 如果你住在魁北克附近，你或许会找到一些法语电台。

sentences.english: The songs on this album became popular hits and were broadcast on television and radio station throughout Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 专辑歌曲如此畅销，阿富汗全国电视电台纷纷播送。

sentences.english: Next time somebody asks for a radio interview, I’ll do better.
sentences.chinese: 下次有人邀我做电台访问的时候，我会做得更好些。

sentences.english: Allen Lee Peng-fei recently became the third Hong Kong radio personality to go off the air.
sentences.chinese: 李鹏飞是香港最近封咪的第三位电台主持。

sentences.english: College stations play all kinds of music, from jazz to hard rock.
sentences.chinese: 大学电台播放各种类型的音乐，从爵士到重摇滚。

sentences.english: Many car radios are fitted with RDS (radio data systems) which carry local radio reports.
sentences.chinese: 许多车载广播台都配有报告最新路况的电台。

sentences.english: I got this off of NPR.
sentences.chinese: 我从公共广播电台听到的。

sentences.english: I tried WOC Radio in Davenport, Iowa.
sentences.chinese: 我试着到爱荷华州达文波特的woc电台去求职。

sentences.english: That night I listened to a call-in program on the radio;
sentences.chinese: 那天夜里我收听了广播电台的采访节目。

sentences.english: No testing of the equipment items will be arranged by RTHK.
sentences.chinese: 香港电台不会安排仪器物件的测试。

sentences.english: The radio says someone found a very old tree.
sentences.chinese: 电台上说有人发现了一棵非常老的树。

sentences.english: The London Symphony Orchestra  broadcasts every Sunday on London Station.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦交响乐团每星期日都在伦敦电台演出节目。

sentences.english: That means some people like to keep it on for hours.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着有些人喜欢好几个小时地收听网络电台。

sentences.english: This is what I have just written to the Radio song lyrics .
sentences.chinese: 这是我刚给电台台歌写的歌词。

definition: broadcast/CL:個|个[ge4]/broadcasting/to broadcast/(formal) to propagate/to publicize

pinyin: Zhong1 yang1 guang3 bo1 dian4 tai2
